features: ★☆【𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟯 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗥𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗮𝘀𝗲𝗱 𝗞𝗶𝗱𝘀 𝗖𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗮】With its impressive 36.0-megapixel resolution, this digital camera significantly elevates image clarity when compared to other cameras designed for children and kids. It is an excellent choice as a Christmas present, birthday gift, graduation gift, or holiday gift for teenagers, kids, and students, boys and girls.

📸【𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗿𝗱 𝗙𝗛𝗗 𝟭𝟬𝟴𝟬𝗣 𝗩𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗼 & 𝗘𝗮𝘀𝘆 𝘁𝗼 𝗨𝘀𝗲】Equipped with a video mode and a built-in microphone, this kids camera allows you to capture smoother and more stable FHD 1080P videos. Additionally, it offers a 16X digital zoom feature, which helps you to effortlessly zoom in or out on images using the W/T button. It also boasts a user-friendly interface, making it super easy for them to operate and control.

❤【𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗮𝗹 & 𝗟𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘄𝗲𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗰𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗮】Designed for kids aged 4-15, this digital camera for teens is constructed from premium eco-friendly materials, ensuring it is non-toxic, durable, and capable of withstanding accidental drops. Its compact and lightweight design makes it portable for kids and teenagers to hold. Encourage your kids to embark on exciting explorations in the enchanting world around them and create lasting, remarkable memories!

🎁【𝗠𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶𝗳𝘂𝗻𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗖𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗮】The compact digital travel camera also can be used as a webcam, enabling you to engage in video calls or live streaming to share your life on social media platforms. The compact portable digital camera for beginner starters has multi-functions, including 16X zoom, pause function, anti-shake, time-lapse, slow motion, continuous shoot, motion detection, face detection, self-timer, etc.

📩【𝗧𝗿𝘂𝘀𝘁𝘄𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗵𝘆 𝗪𝗮𝗿𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁𝘆】We provide a one-year satisfaction warranty, along with a no-hassle replacement policy, any problem, please contact us for help. Package List: 48MP Digital camera, Rechargeable battery, USB cable, Adapter, User manual, Camera bag, Lanyard.
body.description: Warm Tips: 1.Please read the user manual carefully before use. 2.Please format the SD card with your digital camera before the first use. We suggest you use SanDisk Class 10 U1 32GB SD Card. 3.The video camera doesn't support manual/autofocus, the lens is fixed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Package Contents: 1x Digital camera 2x Rechargeable Li-ion battery 1x USB cable 1x Adapter 1x User manual 1x Camera bag 1x Lanyard Warm Tips: 1.Please read the user manual carefully before use. 2.Please format the SD card with your digital camera before the first use. We suggest you use SanDisk Class 10 U1 32GB SD Card. 3.The video camera doesn't support manual/autofocus, the lens is fixed.

FHD 1080P & 36MP & 16X The compact digital camera, featuring FHD 1080P resolution and a 36.0-megapixel capability, enables you to capture your most thrilling and memorable moments in high-quality images and videos. Additionally, this digital camera supports a 16X digital zoom, allowing you to easily zoom in or out using the W/T button. Compact & Portable Comes with a wrist lanyard, helps to carry the camera to anywhere and anytime.Timed shooting enables you to delay the capture and take photos at your convenience, starting after 2, 5, or 10 seconds. The auto-off function conserves energy, allowing you to customize the auto-off time to 1, 3, 5 minutes, or disable the shutdown feature entirely. Smile & Face Detection The camera for teens boasts excellent smile and face detection features, ensuring they capture every joyful moment with friends. With its point-and-shoot simplicity, this basic camera makes it super easy for kids to capture high-quality images and videos—a perfect gift for your children to enjoy.

Good partner Ready for on-the-go adventures, the special mini design enhances the portability of the digital camera, allowing you to carry it anytime and anywhere. Lightweight and easily held with one hand, this portable camera effortlessly fits into your pocket or bag. An ideal gift An ideal present for kids, students, and teens, this digital camera is perfect for capturing their cherished memories in daily life. Whether as a birthday surprise, Christmas gift, or a Children's Day present, it's sure to bring joy and lasting memories. Connect with Computer Included with a USB cable and charger adapter, this digital camera allows you to connect it to a computer for downloading the images and videos you've recorded. In the date and time settings, you have the option to toggle the date stamp on or off.

Image Resolution 36M(7936×4480 HD); 24M(5600×4200); 20M(5200×3900); 16M(4608×3456); 12M(4000 ×3000); 10M(3648×2736); 8M(3264×2448); 7M-Wide(3648×2048 HD); 5M(2592× 1944);3M(2048×1536) Video Resolution 1920×1080 FHD; 1280×720 HD; 640×480 VGA Zoom 16x digital zoom Self-timer 2s/5s/10s Image format JPG Video format AVI Auto Off 1minutes/3minutes/5minutes/No shutdown White Balance Auto/Daylight/Cloudy/Fluorescent /Tungsten Storage media Suggest you use SanDisk Class 10 U1 32GB SD Card Radio Record Build-in microphone Exposure compensation EV-3.0 ~+3.0 PC Interface USB 2.0

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the cutest little camera!!! The quality makes me so nostalgic and it’s so easy to use. Definitely bringing this everywhere with me. I was missing the old digital photos and printed ones too from my childhood I had to get this. It’s also so easy to transfer to your computer/phone you just need an as card reader! Tip: careful with yelling too loud near the speaker on the bottom right. Me and my friend were dying laughing when we played back a video and it sounded so blown out because she was talking so close to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cute camara!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a really cool camera I gifted it to my nephew and he really loves it!! He has taken so many beautiful pictures and I think his cat will be famous with all the cute videos he shooted of it lol A really nice camera !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NO SD CARD!
reviews.reviewText: I looked at so many cameras and ended up choosing this one. I assumed it came with the SD card like all the other cameras did. Nope, this one didn't. Now I need to buy an SD card as well. Next time, I'll pay attention to what's truly included. I mean, who sells a camera without storage? Seriously! And, this was a gift! Not happy! It should've stated in large letters that you need an SD card! I'm sending it back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This came pretty fast and it’s so beautiful it comes with two batteries and a charger plus others items my niece is going to love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Wonderful Gift for Aspiring Photographers!
reviews.reviewText: I gifted this digital camera to my niece for her photography class, and it has been a fantastic choice. The 1080P 36MP quality is impressive, making her school projects stand out. The ease of use is perfect for a beginner photographer like her. She's been able to navigate its features intuitively, which has boosted her confidence in her photography skills. The time stamp feature is a neat addition, helping her track the progress of her projects. What's really made a difference is the 16X zoom capability. She's been able to capture detailed shots from a distance, which was a challenge with her previous camera. The two batteries are a bonus, ensuring she never misses a moment due to a dead battery. This camera has been more than just a school tool for her; it's become a gateway to exploring her passion for photography. It's heartwarming to see her eyes light up as she shares her latest shots. This camera has undoubtedly enhanced her photographic journey and brought her immense joy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ignite Creativity with This Excellent Kids Camera!
reviews.reviewText: This Kids Camera is a fantastic tool for young aspiring photographers. The 1080P video and 36MP photo quality are impressive, providing crisp and vibrant images. The camera is straightforward to use, which is perfect for children. Having two batteries is extremely convenient, ensuring continuous usage without interruptions. The anti-shake feature is beneficial, as it helps in taking steady shots. The 16x zoom is an exciting feature for kids to explore different perspectives. Its compact size makes it an ideal portable camera for trips and outdoor activities. It's not only a fun toy but also a great educational tool for kids to learn about photography.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gift for kids
reviews.reviewText: My son is four years old and he likes to do things independently more and more. He is no longer satisfied with us taking pictures of him, he always wants to take pictures of the things he likes by himself. I bought this camera as a Christmas gift for him. Although this camera does not have high functional configurations, its 36MP high-definition photos and 1080P videos can fully meet your daily shooting needs. And the 16X digital zoom can bring the distance closer and take clearer photos. More importantly, its anti-shake function can help children take stable and clear photos when their arm strength is insufficient. It is the size of a playing card, very lightweight, and the bright color is more suitable for children. I believe it is definitely a perfect gift for children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t come with sd card
reviews.reviewText: I’m upset because I saw that people that have ordered got an sd card with it - but I did not receive one. I can’t really rate the camera cos I can’t even use it / take a picture without the sd card
